mapper.sql: user_taobao.id AS userTaobao_id, user_taobao.user_name AS userTaobao_userName, user_taobao.email AS userTaobao_email, user_taobao.user_level AS userTaobao_userLevel, user_taobao.nick_name AS userTaobao_nickName, user_taobao.gender AS userTaobao_gender, user_taobao.account_balance AS userTaobao_accountBalance, user_taobao.financial_account_balance AS userTaobao_financialAccountBalance, user_taobao.credit_quota AS userTaobao_creditQuota, user_taobao.consume_quota AS userTaobao_consumeQuota, user_taobao.address AS userTaobao_address

id AS id, user_name AS userName, email AS email, user_level AS userLevel, nick_name AS nickName, gender AS gender, account_balance AS accountBalance, financial_account_balance AS financialAccountBalance, credit_quota AS creditQuota, consume_quota AS consumeQuota, address AS address
mapper.select: select from user_taobao,authentication WHERE user_taobao.user_id=authentication.user_id AND `user_zhifubao`.`phone` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{phone}),'%') AND authentication.auditor_id=#{adminId} AND datediff(user_taobao.gmt_datetime,#{time1}) >=0 AND datediff(user_taobao.gmt_datetime,#{time2}) <=0 AND `user_taobao`.`status`='使用' ORDER BY user_taobao.gmt_datetime DESC LIMIT ${pageNo},${pageSize}

select COUNT(*) from user_taobao,authentication WHERE user_taobao.user_id=authentication.user_id AND `user_taobao`.`status`='使用' AND `user_zhifubao`.`phone` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{phone}),'%') AND authentication.auditor_id=#{adminId} AND datediff(user_taobao.gmt_datetime,#{time1}) >=0 AND datediff(user_taobao.gmt_datetime,#{time2}) <=0
